summary: The contractors who work at weapons labs, plants, and sites for the National Nuclear Security Administration track and report costs in different ways. However, Congress needs comparable information to provide oversight and to make budget decisions across these sites. Legislation for FY 2017 required NNSA to implement a common financial reporting system. This report assesses NNSA's actions since our Jan. 2020 review . NNSA has...
title: National Nuclear Security Administration: Actions Needed to Improve Usefulness of Common Financial Data
